data.title: Shell Shockers
data.description: Egg-themed multiplayer shooter where you play as armed eggs. Crack your enemies before they crack you!
data.instructions: WASD to move, mouse to aim and shoot, Space to jump, E to change weapon

data.title: Slither.io
data.description: Classic snake game reimagined for multiplayer. Eat, grow, and become the biggest snake on the server!
data.instructions: Mouse to move, click or Space to boost (uses your length)

data.title: Zombs Royale
data.description: Fast-paced 2D battle royale. Drop in, loot weapons, and fight to be the last one standing in 100-player matches!
data.instructions: WASD to move, mouse to aim and shoot, E to pickup items, Tab for inventory

data.title: Pacman
data.description: Classic arcade game where you navigate a maze, eat dots, and avoid ghosts

data.title: Ev.io
data.description: Futuristic arena shooter with stunning graphics. Battle other players in sci-fi environments with advanced weapons.
data.instructions: WASD to move, mouse to aim and shoot, Space to jump, Shift to dash

data.title: Diep.io
data.description: Control a tank and shoot obstacles and enemies to level up. Upgrade your stats and become the most powerful tank!
data.instructions: WASD or Arrow keys to move, mouse to aim, click or Space to shoot. Destroy shapes to level up!

data.title: Smash Karts
data.description: 3D multiplayer kart battle arena. Race and fight against players worldwide with crazy weapons and power-ups.
data.instructions: WASD or Arrow keys to drive, Space to use weapon

data.title: Lordz.io
data.description: Medieval strategy game where you build an army and conquer the map. Command knights, archers, and dragons!
data.instructions: Mouse to move, click buttons to recruit units, collect gold to expand your army

data.title: Drift Hunters
data.description: Ultimate drifting experience with realistic physics. Customize your car and master the art of drifting.
data.instructions: Arrow keys to drive, Space for handbrake, C to change camera

data.title: Krunker.io
data.description: Fast-paced first-person shooter with blocky graphics. Jump, aim, and shoot your way to victory in this addictive multiplayer FPS.
data.instructions: WASD to move, mouse to aim and shoot, Space to jump, Shift to crouch, R to reload

data.title: Voxiom.io
data.description: Voxel-based multiplayer shooter. Build, destroy, and fight in destructible environments.
data.instructions: WASD to move, mouse to aim and shoot, Space to jump, number keys for weapons
